mapper.select: select guest,photo,diary from setup where hompy_num=#{value}
mapper.update: update hompy set hname=#{hname} where hompy_num=#{hompy_num}
update profile set regdate=now(),content=#{content} where hompy_num=#{hompy_num}
update profile set regdate=now(),todayis=#{todayis} where hompy_num=#{hompy_num}
mapper.select: select * from iu where i_id=#{value} and u_name='신청'
mapper.update: update iu set u_name='일촌' where i_id=#{i_id} and u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.select: select m.*,i.name,i.item_img from mine m join item i on m.item_num=i.item_num where id=#{id} and i.category_num=#{category_num}
select item_img from item where item_num=#{value}
select mini_num from miniroom where hompy_num=#{value}
select mine_num from mine where id=#{id} and item_num=#{item_num}
select mine_num from room_posi where mine_num=#{mine_num} and mini_num=#{mini_num}
